comments:
Description:
Top/Bottom function issue in xtab grand total.
Build number:2.2.0.v200706211316

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a crosstab.
2. Add a grand total for row area using function is-top-n.
3. Preview.

Expected result:
is-top-n should provide way to input argument n.
If we don't support such functions, remove them from the function list.

Actual result:
Such function can only be selected and no way to set argument n.
Preview will throw ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException.

Error log:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1

Double click the data item in grand total to open aggregation dialog, only eight functions available.
But if I add grand total in Property Editor, the functions available are much more than that.
GUI should remove those unsupported functions.
We have the API to return the function list supported by xtab measure, GUI should call that list.

Update function list in grandtotal and subtotal dialog with the new API.
Fixed.

Verify in build 2.2.1.v200707110630.

Unsupported functions have been removed from total dialog from Property Editor.
